required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: the Safety and Efficacy of Meplazumab in Patients With COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized Controlled, add-on Phase 2/3 Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Meplazumab in Patients With COVID-19

lead_sponsor.agency: Jiangsu Pacific Meinuoke Bio Pharmaceutical Co Ltd

clinical_study.source: Jiangsu Pacific Meinuoke Bio Pharmaceutical Co Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multicenter, double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled phase 2/3 clinical study. Based on the results of the Phase I clinical study, one repeat dose group and one placebo group are used for the standard treatment of the Novel Coronavirus Pneumonia Protocol (Trial 8) The treatment regimen is a one-time intravenous infusion of either mprozumab or placebo on day 1 (D1) and day 8 (D8) of the treatment period at a dose of 0.2 mg/kg based on body weight. An estimated 150 subjects will be randomly assigned to either Meplazumab or placebo in a 2:1 ratio A short-term efficacy evaluation was performed to determine the efficacy and safety of Meplazumab in each subject within 14 days of initial administration and a long-term follow-up evaluation was performed 28 days after initial administration to determine the safety of Meplazumab.

primary_outcome.measure: Time of virus nucleic acid test turning negative
primary_outcome.description: Time of virus nucleic acid test turning negative

secondary_outcome.description: Changes from pre-dose baseline in CT

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the immune response profile
secondary_outcome.description: Immune response profile characterized according immune cells and subsets and CRP.
Change from pre-dose baseline in blood biochemistry:Fbg,Cr,BUN,UA,AST,ALT,g-GT,TBIL,ALB,TP,NA,K,Ca,CL

arm_group.description: First dose: 0.2 mg/kg - Day 1; Second dose: 0.2 mg/kg - Day 8
First dose: control - Day 1; Second dose: control -Day 8
